suggestion.preview: JavaScript is a programing language used extensively in the creation of websites. How to update settings Warning: disabling JavaScript can interfere with the functionality of most modern websites.

suggestion.name: Screen Settings
suggestion.preview: Modern displays allow for a multitude of calibration options, from your screens resolution, to the number of colors it will render. The calibration of these can effect your browsing experience.
